## Description {#details}

A base class for all GenericMachineInstrs.

Definition at line 28 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.

### getReg() {#a2cdf10ff4f5fb865c6a669331aeb5846}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="Register llvm::GenericMachineInstr::getReg (unsigned Idx) const"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Access the Idx&#39;th operand as a register and return it.

This assumes that the Idx&#39;th operand is a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> type.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h/#l00038">38</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
